name: Horse Racing
description:
This is a game I made for Mini Ludum Dare 17. The jam required all games to use the same predetermined palette.

I was inspired by watching speed skating during the Olympics. Press 1,2,3,4 to bet on horses. The earlier you make a bet the more you win as indicated by the x4 and x2 lines. The more you win the faster the game gets. Last as long as you can withstand.
